item.title: Korea Box Office: ‘My Daughter is a Zombie’ Holds No. 1, ‘Ballerina’ Debuts in Third
item.description: “My Daughter is a Zombie” maintained its grip on the Korean box office over the Aug. 8–10 weekend, earning $5.9 million from 840,484 admissions. According to KOBIS, the tracking service op
